price: នួហបានពោលថាៈ ឱម្ចាស់របស់ខ្ញុំ. សូមទ្រង់មេត្ដាកុំទុក ឱ្យពួកគ្មានជំនឿណាម្នាក់រស់នៅលើផែនដីនេះអី្វ។
arabic: وَقَالَ نُوحٞ رَّبِّ لَا تَذَرۡ عَلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ دَيَّارًا

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: waqāla nūḥun rabbi lā tadhar ʿalā al-arḍi mina al-kāfirīna dayyāran
